text: Lycée Franco-Bolivien Lycée Franco-Bolivien Alcide d'Orbigny () is a French international school in La Paz, Bolivia."Contact"/"Contacto." Lycée Franco- Bolivien. Retrieved on 24 March 2015. "Av. Francia s/n, AchumaniCasilla postal 6547 La Paz - Bolivia" The school serves primaire (primary school),"Lista de Libros Gestión Primaria ." Lycée Franco-Bolivien. Retrieved on 24 March 2015. through the final year of lycée (senior high school), terminale."Lista de Libros Gestión Secundaria ." Lycée Franco-Bolivien. Retrieved on 24 March 2015. The school has a statue of its namesake, French naturalist Alcide d'Orbigny."Notre histoire"/"Nuestra historia." Lycée Franco-Bolivien.
